overview:
Web Enterpreneur who has Co-founded and started up 3 successful web businesses. It started with Onlinetradesmen.com in 2005, then Handyhardware.ie was added. It culminated in the launch of Membertender.com in 2011!

Onlinetradesmen.com is the largest hom improvement maketplace in Ireland, connecting property owners to qualified trade professionals. It removes the hassle from home improvement projects. In addition it has evolved into a rich business support platform for trade professionals - providing them with work, business web sites, group discounts and business networking all from a common platform.

Handyhardware.ie is a full feature E-Commerce platform, selling tools and materials nationwide in Ireland. With over 50,000 products, it is Ireland’s largest online retailer.

MemberTender.com is a cloud based service for membership associations. It enables them to improve their business and provide better support to their members. Using it membership bodies can provide new value add services to their members, while improving their own revenues and profitability. www.membertender.com
